titleStmt.title: A nevv anatomie VVherein the body of man is very fit and aptly (two wayes) compared: 1 To a household. 2 To a cittie. With diuers necessarie approoued medicines, not commonly practised heretofore: wittie, and pleasant to be read, and profitable to be regarded.
New anatomie.
titleStmt.author: Underwood, Robert, fl. 1605.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. White] for William Iones, and are to be sold at the signe of the Gunne neare Holborne Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.

place.placeName: the signe of the Gunne neare Holborne Conduit
